channel.title: Radio buttons question quick answer needed!
channel.description: well im making forms for bigfish but i cant seem to get the radiobuttons working, can anyone tell me what to add in the setup or what procedure to make for them?

item.title: Radio buttons question quick answer needed!
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

If you want more than one set of radio buttons use group boxes and put each set inside a different group box.

Also, to use the values:

[scar]If(RadioButton1.Checked)Then[/scar]

Read full topic
